title: [Snyk] SNYK-PYTHON-NLTK-15317401 in nltk@3.8.1
description:
## Arbitrary Code Injection

**Severity:** high
**Package:** nltk@3.8.1
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/requirements.txt`

**CVSS Score:** 7.9  
**Exploit Maturity:** proof-of-concept  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 788/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2025-14009](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-14009)

**Fix:** Pin `nltk` to version 3.9.3 or later.

### Details
## Overview
[nltk](http://www.nltk.org) is a Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK) is a Python package for natural language processing.

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Arbitrary Code Injection via the `_unzip_iter()` function due to the lack of validation before unpacking untrusted downloaded packages. An attacker can execute arbitrary code by supplying a specially crafted zip file.
## Remediation
Upgrade `nltk` to version 3.9.3 or higher.
## References
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/nltk/nltk/commit/1056b323af6462455571302e766b67cf300aea18)
- [GitHub PR](https://github.com/nltk/nltk/pull/3468)
- [Huntr Report](https://huntr.com/bounties/49ecbc02-054e-4470-b2e0-b267936cc4e4)
- [Red Hat Bugzilla Bug](https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2440724)


### Reference
- [Snyk advisory](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-NLTK-15317401)
